docs.title: About me
docs.text:
Hello, my name is Andreas Schaler. I am a Software Engineer. I have experience in Full Stack Web Application development, AWS Cloud, and modern LLM development.

I graduated with my bachelors in Computer Science in 2022 from Kent State University with a focus in Data Engineering. Since then I have held a position as DevSecOps Engineer at Nimbis Service Inc.

See my Resume and Github and connect with me on LinkedIn and by Email at andreas.schaler.cs@gmail.com
